the Higgs mechanism, explaining the mass of elementary particles in the Standard Model

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the antiproliferative effects of folate on ovarian cancer cells.

sentences.english: Objective To explore the inhibitory mechanism of Imatinib mesylate on pulmonary fibrosis induced by bleomycin in mice.

sentences.english: And these various feedback mechanisms quickly facilitate jumpstarting the necessary people into action.

sentences.english: The author introduced current knowledge of the mechanisms of histone H2B ubiquitination and its significance.
